alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 06 at 6:39PM AST until February 06 at 7:45PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Bayamon in Puerto Rico... Carolina in Puerto Rico... Catano in Puerto Rico... Guaynabo in Puerto Rico... San Juan in Puerto Rico... Trujillo Alto in Puerto Rico... * Until 745 PM AST. * At 639 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen from the previous rainfall. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 1 inch is possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. The Rio Bayamon is still out of its banks. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and Emergency Managers. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
